select id as id, parent_id as parentId, name as name, tel as tel, sort as sort, remarks as remarks from unit where id = #{id} order by sort desc
mapper.insert: insert into unit( id, parent_id, name, tel, sort, remarks ) values ( #{id}, #{parentId}, #{name}, #{tel}, #{sort}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: update unit set parent_id = #{parentId}, name = #{name}, tel = #{tel}, sort = #{sort}, remarks = #{remarks} where id = #{id}
